body:
# State of the Repo Report, January 2020

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics â enjoy! ð¤

854 authors (+5) have contributed to the project (merged contributions). Thank you! â¤ï¸

The repo contains 519 848 (+2 244) lines of text and 1 859 (+8) files.

22 763 (+248) commits have been made of which 4 690 (+91) are merge commits.

There are currently 346 (+3) open pull requests from in total 89 (-5) contributors.

If all open pull requests were merged the project line count would grow by roughly 37 percent.

The total set of open pull requests adds 223 155 lines, removes 30 670 lines and touches 3 552 distinct files.

The "median open pull request" adds 56 lines, removes 18 lines and touches 4 files.

Previous edition: [State of the Repo, December 2019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/17832)
